thread.title: Did Jesus Rise from the Dead? A Debate Featuring Matt Dillahunty and Dr. Mike Licona

author: Hemant Mehta
title: Did Jesus Rise from the Dead? A Debate Featuring Matt Dillahunty and Dr. Mike Licona
text:
« Study Finds That Atheists, Just Like the Devoutly Religious, Don’t Fear Death About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
